website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive little LEGO set may be simple to put together, but little animal lovers will enjoy taking good care of their tiny pets with its many included tools.
pros: Build a small stable, corral, bunny hutch, transport, and trailer

customer_reviews.title: Love legos...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter spends hours playing with her micro animals so thought this would fit the bill for her 6th birthday and I wasn't wrong! Very easy to follow instructions . She loves this set!
customer_reviews.author: XandraBee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lego Set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter who loves Lego Friends. This is a nice set and she loves it. I felt that the price was not bad either. The parts seem to be of good quality and I have no complaints. Everything was included as shown on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Taking It Back Home

customer_reviews.title: little bit much for a 3 year old but mom enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter had fun playing with the pieces but wasn't too interested in putting it together. Her mom, however, had a great time. It has horses and cute pieces and once together we had fun pretending to care for the animals.
customer_reviews.author: 3 Cat Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: Great for younger kids wanting too do Legos. My 4.5 year old isn't quite ready for Legos yet but she doesn't want duplos anymore. These are great. Pretty simple to follow directions. She loves the horses and has already paired it with the vet set we already have so that the horses are well taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Lcook116

customer_reviews.title: Just right for this age
customer_reviews.text: Make those little minds think, Make those little fingers work plus, the kids seeing that they have accomplished something make the kids feel good about themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my daughter's birthday. She loved it, and it took her about 20 minutes to put together and set up. However, she plays pretend with it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D Miller

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old did this in about 45 minutes with some assistance. It was so fun! She’s new to legos and this was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Gaylord

customer_reviews.title: Legos are so fun
customer_reviews.text: Last delivery. My niece loved putting it together and playing with it too
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R. Poe

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my daughters Easter basket and she loves it. It took her about 10 minutes to set it up and once she got it set up she discovered that she somehow got an extra carrot for her horse and water bowl that wasn’t suppose to be included. She plays with this constantly and takes apart and reassembles it with no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sammielee711

customer_reviews.title: A little girls Lego wonderland!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased for granddaughter. She loves the friends collection. Pieces are tiny, so place on tray to avoid losing pieces while you build! Quick put together and along with other friends sets provides hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Indy Andi

customer_reviews.title: Legos are always fun!
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong giving Legos to a child. My 6 yr old granddaughter absolutely loves this. When in doubt as to what to buy for a young person for a birthday or Christmas present, your best bet is always LEGOS!
customer_reviews.author: Deb's

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My 6.5 year old was able to put this together by herself. She loves this Lego set and is asking me for more like it. She has disassembled it, but continues to make creations with the pieces and plays with the minifigs and minianimals.
customer_reviews.author: Devora

customer_reviews.title: FUN BUILDING AND HORSES TOO
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 9 year old for Christmas. She really enjoys LEGO friends and she also loves animals. I can’t wait to see how much fun she’ll have playing with this set as well. Lego friends make great gifts for kids ages 6 and older in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: CalledMama

customer_reviews.title: Just what my 6 year old granddaughter wanted, but not 2x.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and had to return. She loved it so much that she asked Santa for it at Christmas. Ooops. Traded for another lego product. You can never go wrong with Lego.
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: Fun Set!
customer_reviews.text: Fun Set - finished it in a morning with my 6 year old. My girls have enjoyed playing with it since then. Came in good condition, it was a fun beginning set.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great find for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 3 year old that watches her big brother play with regular Legos. They are a bit larger which is great for her to take apart and assemble. She will play for hours! Great price.
customer_reviews.author: camden stacy

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Easy to Set Up
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of putting together Lego toys, but this one was fun and easy. My 4 year old and I did it together, and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: jovigirl214

customer_reviews.title: Super cute LEGO set for 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter loves this set. It’s her first set of smaller legos instead of duplos. She was able to put it together mostly by herself with just a little parent support. Darling horses and bunnies for fun imaginative play after building.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my 6 year old. Challenges her and keeps her entertained. Great for us to build together!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners to Legos
customer_reviews.text: Great set for beginner to Legos. My almost 4 year old could do this almost by herself with a like help keeping track of where she was in the directions.

product_meta.title: LEGO Friends 4+ Mia’s Foal Stable 41361 Building Kit (118 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Let your child express their nurturing side with LEGO Friends 41361 4+ Mia’s Foal Stable. This LEGO 4+ horse farm toy is specially designed to be fun and easy for preschoolers and youngsters, with animal figures for role-play fun, as well as a tractor, a tack room in the toy horse stable and a fenced paddock. The special Starter Brick base lets even first-time builders experience the pride of constructing buildings, vehicles and more, all on their own. The included simple guide to build and play will also help your young animal lover understand the purpose of the building steps and grow their imagination and confidence for the perfect start to LEGO brick building in a familiar LEGO Friends setting.
feature_bullets: Build a cute toy horse barn and tractor with special Starter Brick base to quickly get your child building and playing out countless adventures
Early toy for beginners and includes a Mia mini-doll figure, plus 2 horse figures and a rabbit figure

The simple guide to build and play with this LEGO Friends horse set will help your youngster understand the purpose of the building steps, and grow their confidence for the perfect start to LEGO brick building
This LEGO 4+ entry level horse and stable toy can be built together with all other original LEGO sets and LEGO bricks for creative building

LEGO Friends horse stable measures 2-inch (6cm) high, 5-inch (14cm) wide and 3-inch (8cm) deep tractor measures over 1-inch (4cm) high, 3-inch (10cm) long and 1-inch (5cm) wide 118 pieces ¬– for boys and girls aged 4+ and for fans and kids of all ages

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,163 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
